author: JumpingYang001
body: Add Get-Process Pester test for issue #147

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
Just a note, if you use '#147' instead of 'issue 147' in the commit message (and in issue/PR comments), GitHub will automatically link them, and will close the issue automatically when the commit is merged. It's handy!

This LGTM.

comments.author: JumpingYang001
comments.body: @andschwa ho, got it, will take care next time.

title: Add Get-Process Pester test for issue 147
